name: 2 Player Pacman
description:
Two Player Pacman is exactly how it sounds! One Pacman or Jeffu-Man takes on their friends now turn foe Ghost trying to eat all the pellets before they run out of lives! The two far left and right openings of the map provide a classic teleporter/warp function to let you zip away or towards your foes and the powerups located in the four corners of the map let Pacman turn the tables on their ghostly friend! Our goal was to create a Pacman classic experience with more of a personal interaction between the ghost and Pacman as both players fight to take down the other and have fun along the way!

===Controls===

Space - Start Game

Esc - Quit Game From Main Menu

--Player 1--

WASD - Navigate / Use Menu

1 - Confirm / Unconfirm

1 - Pause / Resume In-Game

Esc - Return to Main Menu From In-Game

--Player 2--

Arrow Keys - Navigate / Use Menu

2 - Confirm / Unconfirm

2 - Pause / Resume In-Game

Enter / Return - Return to Main Menu From In-Game

===Credits===
